name: Delivengo: Shipping methods for WooCommerce
author: delivengo

sections.description:
Requirements

WooCommerce (Regularly tested on its latest version)

Delivengo is a shipping solution for small goods up to 2kg internationally, delivered directly to the recipient’s home in the mailbox.

This plugin allows:
* The configuration and display of delivery methods on the merchant site
* The generation and printing of labels from the B.O. WooCommerce Delivengo
* The follow-up of shipments to recipients

Characteristics:

The Delivengo plugin includes several essential features to ship your orders up to 2kg internationally.

It allows:
– The shipment of parcels to 190 destinations (European Union, Europe and rest of the world – excluding France and Overseas)
– The configuration of customs information
– The creation of labels and customs forms (CN22 / CN23) from the merchant back office
– The generation of a deposit slip (for Delivengo Profil customers)
– The follow-up of orders

Benefits for the e-merchant:

The Delivengo plugin is a complete and free solution that will save you time in the daily processing of your orders and the follow-up of your shipments. You will be able to easily develop your export sales by offering the competitive services of the Delivengo range.

  • Ease of use: create your labels, complete your customs formalities, track your shipments… directly in your back office.
  • Competitive offer: Delivengo offers very affordable rates internationally adapted to the weight of your shipments, to your destinations.
  • Choice of product and service level: according to the chosen Delivengo offer, access to the Priority service, with or without tracking, or Economic as well as to the recommendation option. Benefit from a follow-up to the recipient to 43 destinations, follow-up to the border for other destinations.
  • A delivery to the recipient’s home in the mailbox: Delivengo parcels are delivered directly to the mailbox.
  • A simplified parcel deposit: your parcels can be deposited directly in one of the 9000 postal contact points for Delivengo easy or collected within your premises for Delivengo easy and profile.

In case of need, you will be able to rely on Delivengo’s technical support.

Benefits for the e-buyer:

Delivengo also makes life easier for the recipient, a simple and easy shipping service. Delivery is made directly to their home, in their mailbox.
The e-buyer can follow the progress of their parcel on their customer area.

This plugin has been developed by the Delivengo team, a subsidiary of La Poste.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0 – July 2, 2024

  • Fixed a warning message on HPOS compatibility code
  • Improved the way labels are downloaded
  • Labels can now be downloaded from the order page
  • The default prices have been updated
  • Added dependency to WooCommerce with the new WordPress dependency system
  • Improved the description for the “Free from order value”

1.1.0 – November 13, 2023

  • Added compatibility with the HPOS option of WooCommerce
  • The shipping phone number is now used in priority when available
  • Disabled message logging by default
  • Improved the way labels are generated from the order page
  • Fixed a PHP warning on the methods definition

1.0.0 – June 14, 2023

  • Added the settings tab
  • Added the shipping methods
  • Added a listing for orders shipped with Delivengo
  • Added an optional tracking email
  • Added a tracking link on the order page

short_description: This plugin allows you to use the Delivengo shipping methods in WooCommerce
